member.name: T:AutoApi.AutoApiClient
member.summary: Client for the auto-api.com car listings API.

member.name: M:AutoApi.AutoApiClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Creates a new AutoApiClient with the given API key.
member.param: Optional HttpClient instance. If provided, the client will not be disposed.

member.name: M:AutoApi.AutoApiClient.GetFiltersAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns available filters for a source (brands, models, body types, etc.)

member.name: M:AutoApi.AutoApiClient.GetOffersAsync(System.String,AutoApi.OffersParams,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a paginated list of offers with optional filters.

member.name: M:AutoApi.AutoApiClient.GetOfferAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a single offer by inner_id.

member.name: M:AutoApi.AutoApiClient.GetChangeIdAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a change_id for the given date (format: yyyy-mm-dd).

member.name: M:AutoApi.AutoApiClient.GetChangesAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a changes feed (added/changed/removed) starting from change_id.

member.name: M:AutoApi.AutoApiClient.GetOfferByUrlAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns offer data by its URL on the marketplace. Uses POST /api/v1/offer/info with x-api-key header.

member.name: M:AutoApi.AutoApiClient.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the internal HttpClient if it was created by this instance.

member.name: T:AutoApi.ApiException
member.summary: Base exception for all auto-api.com API errors.

member.name: P:AutoApi.ApiException.StatusCode
member.summary: HTTP status code returned by the API.

member.name: P:AutoApi.ApiException.ResponseBody
member.summary: Raw response body from the API.

member.name: T:AutoApi.OfferItem
member.summary: A single item in the offers result array. Data is a JsonElement because the structure varies between sources.

member.name: T:AutoApi.ChangeItem
member.summary: A single item in the changes result array. Data is a JsonElement because the structure varies between sources.

member.name: T:AutoApi.OffersParams
member.summary: Query parameters for GetOffersAsync. Only non-null values are sent to the API.
